ModMetaData.name: Nals Facial Animation for HAR
ModMetaData.author: Daemon976
ModMetaData.description:
Patch adds compatibility between [NL] Facial Animation - WIP and several Humanoid Alien Races.
Adds: Androids Arachne Asari Astoriel Bun Callistans Crystalloid Crystalloid Androids Dragonians Drow Hisa Human Hive Kijin Lord of the Rims - Elves (Continued) Lord of the Rims - Dwarves (Continued) Lord of the Rims - Hobbits (Continued) Moyo NewRatkinPlus Nyaron Orassans Rabbie The Moonrabbit Race Rakkle Revia Thrumboian Trench Cats
IMPORTANT: To use with Rabbie and Ratkin, you MUST have the vanilla face patches from the races creators installed and in your load order BEFORE this patch.
Rabbie: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2060468943 Ratkin: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1613269214
